attributes.title: Possibly the worst app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what Trump was planning on doing for his campaign. But, when I opened the app turns out it was only garbage and pictures of an orange in various forms. If this is any reflection of what Trump represents I will not be voting for him.
